original_text: The Lord saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth, and that every intention of the thoughts of his heart was only evil continually.
korean_text: 여호와께서 사람의 죄악이 세상에 가득함과 그의 마음으로 생각하는 모든 계획이 항상 악할 뿐임을 보시고

sentences.original_text: that the wickedness of man was great in the earth
and that every intention of the thoughts of his heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 마음의 생각은 모든 의도가
